Interface ConsoleIO

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsoleScanner
public interface ConsoleIO
Abstraction for console-based input/output used by the application. Allows swapping ConsoleScanner for other I/O implementations in tests.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Close any underlying resources associated with this ConsoleIO.
    void
    print(String message)
    Print text to the console without adding a terminating newline.
    void
    println(String message)
    Print a line terminated with a newline to the console.
    String
    readLine()
    Read a single line of input from the console.

  • Method Details

    • readLine

      String readLine()
      Read a single line of input from the console.
      Returns:
      the input line as a String

    • println

      void println(String message)
      Print a line terminated with a newline to the console.
      Parameters:
      message - the text to print

    • print

      void print(String message)
      Print text to the console without adding a terminating newline.
      Parameters:
      message - the text to print

    • close

      void close()
      Close any underlying resources associated with this ConsoleIO. Should be called when the application is shutting down.
